summary: The fascinating love story between Jorge and Laura from 1980 to 1999, within a context in which Argentine politics and history transits between the dictatorship, the Falklands war and the nascent democracy.
cast: Ricardo Darín|Soledad Villamil|Ulises Dumont|Eduardo Blanco|Graciela Tenenbaum|Alfonso De Grazia|Alicia Zanca|Mariana Richaudeau|Alejandro Buzzoni|Rodrigo De la Serna|David Masajnik|Magela Zanotta|Melina González|Celina Zambón|Daniel Marcove|Walter Rippel|Inés Baum|Ramiro Vayo|Jorge Nolasco|Alix Hernán|María Laura Topa|Federico Canepa|Germán Bichiera|Luis Ferreyra|Andrés Martínez|José Pablo Feinmann|Javier Garrido|Estefanía Piotti|Carlos Bustamante|León Dogodny|Amalia Espósito|Sara Mariani|Sandra Merlo|Oscar Soto|Sebastián Terragni|Daniel Topino|Oscar Truzzi
keywords: loss of father|typewriter gag|six word title|comma in title|punctuation in title
title: El mismo amor, la misma lluvia
